battleship2000.ui.playback

Class AudioContent

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleship2000.ui.playback.AudioContent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogicObserver, Runnable

    public class AudioContent
extends Object
implements Runnable, LogicObserver
    Handles the loading and retrieving of the BattleshipGui's audio content.
    Author:
    Petri Kallio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AudioContent(BattleshipGui gui)
      Constructs a new instantiation of the class and creates the Audibles needed for the game.

      • update

        public void update(StateChange stateChange,
          Object... object)
        Description copied from interface: LogicObserver
        The method called by the BattleShipGame object to communicate changes in the game's status to the implementing class.
        Specified by:
        update in interface LogicObserver
        Parameters:
        stateChange - a StateChange enum type used to address the right observer
        object - an array of objects to be parsed by the observer if need be
        See Also:

      • isUpdated

        public boolean isUpdated()
        Description copied from interface: LogicObserver
        Returns the updated status of the LogicObserver

        Note! This method is used mainly in testing the implementing class to find out whether it's responding to the update method calls.

        Specified by:
        isUpdated in interface LogicObserver
        Returns:
        false if the LogicObserver hasn't been updated at least once, true otherwise
